metadata.name: End User Consent Blocked
metadata.comment: Detects when end user consent is blocked due to risk-based consent.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM user_access WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(status_detail) = lower('microsoft.online.security.userconsentblockedforriskyappsexceptions'))

output.summary: Detects when end user consent is blocked due to risk-based consent.
